channel.title: Cool Spot on My New Hugo Site

item.title: The Ballad of Yo! Noid
item.description: [whitebox] Hey guys, Ernie here with a piece from the Tedium archives about Madison Avenue’s infiltration of classic video games, which is legitimately a thing that happened. [big]Today in Tedium: Here’s a challenge for you: Take your favorite video game of the ‘90s and don’t think about it in terms of the quality of the game, its graphical quality, or its replayability—especially if it’s a game based on an existing license.
